text: Lloyd Sherr (born February 28, 1956), also known by his stage name Max Raphael, is an American voice actor and comedian. He became the voice of Fillmore in the Cars franchise (after George Carlin's death in 2008) and Everett in the Barnyard franchise. He also voices Tony Trihull in the Cars series. Sherr's stage name is a combination of his kids' names Max and Raphael (as listed on his website ) ==References== ==Other websites== * * * History Channel's official Modern Marvels site Category:American voice actors Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Lloyd Sherr
